title: No Pay to Win
text:
No item shop

No votingpoint system

No other kind of pay-to-win!

title: Referral Program
text:
Recruit-a-Friend ( 1 - 60 )

3x the experience while leveling with your friend!

Summon your friend directly towards you!

Grant levels to your friends

title: Server Core
text:
Based on Trinity Core.

Backported to Patch 2.4.3.

title: Dynamic Respawns
text:
Depending on Player population, the respawn timer varies.
